import useEventListener from'./useEventListener';import{useCallback}from'react';/**
 * Attaches an event handler outside directly to the `document`,
 * bypassing the react synthetic event system.
 *
 * ```ts
 * useGlobalListener('keydown', (event) => {
 *  console.log(event.key)
 * })
 * ```
 *
 * @param event The DOM event name
 * @param handler An event handler
 * @param capture Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase
 */export default function useGlobalListener(event,handler){let capture=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;const documentTarget=useCallback(()=>document,[]);return useEventListener(documentTarget,event,handler,capture);}
